forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers possible. Low 4C.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers. Lows overnight in the upper 30s.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming less numerous overnight. Low 39F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers, with increasing winds overnight. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy early with rain developing later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy early with rain developing later in the day. High 49F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. E winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 46F. E winds shifting to N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 8C. SSE winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. SSE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 36F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
